articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Broly’s Dragon Ball Super form joins Dragon Ball Fighterz next week
articles.description: Sixth and final fighter for the second season of DLC

articles.author: Nicole Carpenter
articles.title: Black Friday 2019: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe bundle, $25 Amazon credit with new Switch model
articles.description: Nintendo announced its Black Friday deals today, the biggest of which is the Mario Kart 8 Deluxe bundle that gives players the game free with the Nintendo Switch — but only the old version. Amazon is offering a $25 credit with the updated, longer battery model.

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Atari VCS delayed for Indiegogo backers
articles.description: They’ll still get it before everyone else, but not in December

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Ghost Recon Breakpoint survey says players want AI teammates, offline play
articles.description: Ubisoft Paris posted the results of a two-week survey of players of Ghost Recon Breakpoint, saying many of their requests for the beleaguered open-world shooter are “in-progress” to be implemented in 2020.

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Uno removes red and blue cards to try to keep politics out of games
articles.description: To help keep your holiday gatherings (that’s political, for sure) from getting too contentious, Mattel has released a new version of Uno called Uno Nonpartisan that removes the red and blue cards.

articles.author: Colin Campbell
articles.title: Paper Beast is a charming, magical VR journey
articles.description: PlayStation VR exclusive Paper Beast from Pixel Reef is a Journey-like odyssey into a mystical world. It bodes well for Sony’s platform

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Codemasters buys Project CARS developer Slightly Mad Studios for $30M
articles.description: Codemasters now owns the Project CARS series and its developer Slightly Mad Studios.

articles.author: Colin Campbell
articles.title: Gaming community pulls together to tackle breast cancer
articles.description: Casual games portal Big Fish launched a player-program alongside its donation to the National Breast Cancer Foundation.

articles.author: Nicole Carpenter
articles.title: Stardew Valley got a massive update this week
articles.description: Stardew Valley developer Eric Barone uploaded a massive patch, the 1.4 update, this week. There are tons of new things in the game, including a movie theater, new events and dialogue, and clothing. Oh! And your ex-spouses will no longer attend your new weddings.

articles.author: Julia Lee
articles.title: Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp is still fixing old features to right the ship
articles.description: The latest update to Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp fixed Gulliver’s Ship and introduced some subscription plans for the game.
